/*
 * SEAVOTE.cpp
 *
 *  Created on: 07-Apr-2016
 *      Author: sandeep
 */
#include <iostream>

typedef long long int LL;

using namespace std;


int main() {
	// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
	LL t; cin >> t;
	for(LL ti=0;ti<t;ti++){
		LL n; cin >> n;
		double totalSum = 0.000000;
		LL zeroCount = 0;
		for(LL ni=0;ni<n;ni++){
			LL currNum; cin >> currNum;
			totalSum+=currNum;
			if(currNum==0)
				zeroCount++;
		}
		
		if(totalSum==100){
			cout<<"YES"<<endl;
		}else if(totalSum < 100){
			cout<<"NO"<<endl;
		}else{
			totalSum-=100;
			if(totalSum <=(0.999999*(n-zeroCount))){
				cout<<"YES"<<endl;
			}else{
				cout<<"NO"<<endl;
			}
		}
	}
return 0;
}
